reviewsJson.markdown:
**Setup:** Goon LP, dual parallel SS316L 25g @0.1 ohms, 100w power, full cotton wicks

**Testing:** [Liquid Nicotine Wholesalers Blueberry](https://liquidnicotinewholesalers.com/lnw-blueberry.html) @5% steeped three days

**Flavor Description:** This one is really good! Sweet blueberry flavor, think blueberry muffins. this doesn't have the chalky aspect that I detected in the other fruit flavors from LNW, making it more versatile. it has an inherent sweetness to it that might be limiting and takes it away from true blueberry-ness, but should be nice in sweet blueberry mixes. This probably needs other supporting blueberry to reach true potential.

**Off-flavors:** sweetness, but that's not bad, right?

**Throat Hit:** no

**Uses & Pairings:** this will pair beautifully with cheesecake, blueberry muffins, and other bakeries (example: pancakes/waffles). I would keep this out of fruit mixes personally, but it could work if you like them sweet.

**Notes:** 5% here is not very strong, this one could be used rather high I think. I'll use this space to say that I think these flavors would be better if they were more concentrated, however, the low concentration also makes them more forgiving for newbies. another problem is the price point: $3.29 for 15ml that needs 5% for usefulness? seems a bit steep. 

**Second Opinions:** nothing yet.
reviewsJson.author: PerennialPhilosopher
reviewsJson.title: Blueberry
